content.p: The Human Resources Department (HR) is critical in providing strategy, policy, procedures and advice ensuring we continue to get the best from our staff throughout the entire employee life cycle. This includes delivery of effective recruitment and staffing solutions. This section provides you with a clear, step-by-step guide to recruiting the best staff in your area. It covers all the stages of recruitment; from approval to fill a post, (ework) grading a post, advertising, interviewing (including giving feedback), induction to your legal obligations. The links below are accessible to University of Nottingham staff only via SharePoint. Identifying the need to hire Recruitment planning and preparation Selection Offer and on-boarding
